He or She works closely with the Gold Success Manager as well as the account team, product and engineering to identify needs and ensure commitments are met and maintains high levels of customer satisfaction for Gold customers and ensures yearly renewal of service.Reports to: Director, Gold ServicesBE in Information Technology, Computer Science or related.
